content: our woolly good gathering 2026 crochet shawlette designed by chilean designer yessabett bueno is inspired by honeycombs the collective construction of the hive is a symbol of community and who is miss rollo she was the president of the edinburgh and midlothian beekeeper s association from 1942-1945 **measurements** wingspan 160cm / 63 depth 25cm / 9 75 **yarn & hook** iolair yarn luing 70% alpaca 20% silk 10% cashmere 400m / 437yd per 100g 1 skein or 400m / 437yd 3 25mm hook us d/3 **gauge** 23 sts x 16 row = 10cm x 10cm / 4 x 4 measured over main patt before blocking 22 sts x 13 row = 10cm x 10cm / 4 x 4 measured over main patt after blocking **notes** miss rollo s hive shawlette is designed as a one skein project but it can be adapted to be larger by working extra increases and decreases as instructed
